title: Weekly Digest (22 December, 2019 - 29 December, 2019)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 12 issues were created.
Of these, 5 issues have been closed and 7 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #9733 [[#9493] No SNT by default after multiaccount creation / restoring](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9733), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9732 [[#9723] No 'Apply' button appears when updating "Wallet"-> "Account"-…](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9732), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9731 [[#9724] Status is not usable after relogin if add watch-only account …](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9731), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9728 [Can be redirected to login screen with password if multiaccount was created with keycard ("Back" button from login screen)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9728), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9725 [Use "avoid NVM writes" branch](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9725), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:green_heart: #9724 [Status is not usable after relogin if add watch-only account that matches address of one of the created accounts](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9724), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9723 [No 'Apply' button appears when updating "Wallet"-> "Account"-> "Account settings"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9723), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #9734 [Test reply to messages in chats](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9734), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #9730 [Extend e2e about custom mailserver](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9730), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #9729 [[#9709] Empty gas when transacting leads to bug](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9729), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #9727 [Fix alert dismiss if it appears](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9727), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #9726 [Extended existing e2e with new checks](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9726), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #9729 [[#9709] Empty gas when transacting leads to bug](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9729), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
It received 4 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 14 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 7 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #9733 [[#9493] No SNT by default after multiaccount creation / restoring](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9733), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #9732 [[#9723] No 'Apply' button appears when updating "Wallet"-> "Account"-…](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9732), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #9731 [[#9724] Status is not usable after relogin if add watch-only account …](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9731), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #9725 [Use "avoid NVM writes" branch](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9725), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:yellow_heart: #9708 [Move multiaccount data](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9708), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:yellow_heart: #9648 [Add mnemonic validation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9648), by [acolytec3](https://github.com/acolytec3)
:yellow_heart: #9633 [[#9593] Add network for cloudflare RPC](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9633), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 7 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #9734 [Test reply to messages in chats](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9734), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:purple_heart: #9730 [Extend e2e about custom mailserver](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9730), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #9729 [[#9709] Empty gas when transacting leads to bug](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9729), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #9727 [Fix alert dismiss if it appears](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9727), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:purple_heart: #9726 [Extended existing e2e with new checks](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9726), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #9721 [Remove balances for deleted watch account](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9721), by [acolytec3](https://github.com/acolytec3)
:purple_heart: #9447 [Add pin screen for new wallet accounts for Keycard](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9447), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 7 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add pin screen for new wallet accounts for Keycard  Signed-off-by: Vitaliy Vlasov <siphiuel@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/acaea3855170d1c8039bc6c7984f234eb59bf2d0) by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Test reply to messages in chats  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/4096487637e56657661d2a3af9c1e8cdba943dd7) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [extend e2e about mailservers  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/ff268dd5c0a7823d851be6ce53a303263880798b) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#9709] Empty gas when transacting leads to bug  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/b98578ef9dded8587c0573bed1445241859f72cb) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix alert dismiss if it appears  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/d8db958319b233ace58819af970054d912e79484) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Remove balances for deleted watch account  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/8eed77a82af5362e3692c0d5966d2cde53f66b8e) by [acolytec3](https://github.com/acolytec3)
:hammer_and_wrench: [added checks for contact list  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/4fe49568f7912ae4398ec3cf3e6723323badc7ec) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)

# STARGAZERS
Last week there were 7 stagazers.

:star: [Zachariah-Tahir](https://github.com/Zachariah-Tahir)

 - - - 
# RELEASES
Last week there were no releases.

 - - - 

That's all for last week, please <kbd>:eyes: **Watch**</kbd> and <kbd>:star: **Star**</kbd> the repository [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react) to receive next weekly updates. :smiley:

*You can also [view all Weekly Digests by clicking here](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues?q=is:open+is:issue+label:weekly-digest).*
